Adv.BuffAdventures_TMC_At_the_Foot_of_th: At the Foot of the Mountain
SkillDesc.Skill_GeneralAttacksTwice: The general attacks twice per round. The second attack's initiative is "Last Strike".
SkillDesc.Skill_GetStarCoins: After completing an adventure, gain 1 star coin per {0} XP worth of enemies defeated by this army.
SkillDesc.Skill_InstantRecovery: The general recovers instantly after his/her first defeat in every adventure.
SkillDesc.Skill_IncreaseEliteSoldierSpla: Increases the attack damage of your elite soldiers by {3}, and gives their attacks a {8}% chance of dealing splash damage.
SkillDesc.Skill_IncreaseHeavyAD: Increases attack damage of your heavy units by {3}.
SkillDesc.Skill_IncreaseCombatSpeed: Reduces the length of combat rounds by {0}%.
SkillDesc.Skill_IncreaseSwiftSplashAndAD: Increases maximum attack damage of your swift units by {3}, and gives their attacks a {4}% chance of dealing splash damage.
SkillDesc.Skill_IncreaseADEveryRound: Increases attack damage of this army by {3}% after every combat round.
SkillDesc.Skill_IncreaseXP: Increases XP gained from enemy units defeated by this army by {0}%.
SkillDesc.Skill_IncreaseRecoverySpeed: Reduces the general's recovery time by {0}%.
SkillDesc.Skill_IncreaseLongbowmanAndMar: Increases your longbowmen's and regular marksmen's minimum attack damage by {4}%, and the maximum by {0}%.
SkillDesc.Skill_DescreaseBossHP: Decreases HP of enemy bosses by {0}%.
SkillDesc.Skill_GetRecruits: When this army wins a battle, gain 1 recruit mercenary per {0} XP worth of enemies defeated.
SkillDesc.Skill_IncreaseTravelSpeed: Reduces the general's travel time by {0}%.
SkillDesc.Skill_IncreaseBowmanMaximumAD: Increases maximum attack damage of your bowmen by {3}.
SkillDesc.Skill_IncreaseGeneralSplashAnd: Increases the general's attack damage by {3}, and gives his/her attacks a {8}% chance of dealing splash damage.
SkillDesc.Skill_ResurrectLosses: Recovers {0}% of lost units after every battle.
SkillDesc.Skill_IncreasePeacefulMovement: Adds {0}% to the general's movement speed when returning to or transferring the garrison.
SkillDesc.Trait_Anslem: Reduces the accuracy of enemy units to 0%.
SkillDesc.Trait_Vargus: Enemy units deal 5% less damage, and cannot use flanking.
SkillDesc.Trait_Nusala: Your offense units gain splash damage and flanking.
SkillDesc.Trait_MaryDoubleXP: Increases XP gained from enemy units defeated by this army by 100%.
SkillDesc.Trait_MedicResurrectLosses: Recovers 30% of lost units after every battle.
SkillDesc.Trait_MadScientist: Increases attack damage of your heavy units by 100%.
SkillDesc.Trait_Boris: Damage of your swift units increased by 50% and decreased for enemy units. +50% combat XP.
SkillDesc.Trait_Anniversary2019General: Even more kind-hearted than his father, he recovers 20% of lost units after every battle.
SkillDesc.Trait_Halloween2019General: Rogue Wardens: Defensive units gain flanking, and 10% increased accuracy.
SkillDesc.Trait_Xmas2019General: Swift Units gain Flanking, Splash Damage, Accuracy +20% and Damage +20%.
SkillDesc.Trait_AssassinGeneral: Boss and Defense unit HP reduced by 25%. Boss damage reduced by 25%.
SkillDesc.Trait_TrembleBeard: Increases XP gained by 200% for enemy units defeated by his army. Natural Bounty Hunter, does not stack with skills.
SkillDesc.Trait_Sylvana: Increases the damage dealt by swift units by 50%, while decreasing the damage dealt by enemy units. +50% combat XP.
SkillDesc.Trait_GhostGeneral: Unit HP +20%, enemy accuracy is halved, travels 3x as fast, recovers 4x faster and recovers 20% lost units. Natural 1-Up, does not stack with skills.
SkillDesc.Trait_FrostyGeneral: Your defensive units gain splash damage and +30% attack damage.
SkillDesc.Trait_LonerGeneral: Recovers 10% of lost units after every battle. Offensive units get a 50% attack bonus.
SkillDesc.Trait_Loudmouth: Enemy units deal 10% less damage and cannot attack your weakest units first.
SkillDesc.Trait_Nutcracker:
Unit HP +30%.
Recovers 20% of lost units after every battle.
SkillDesc.Trait_Miraculous:
Natural 1-Up.

Recovers 45% of lost units after every battle.
SkillDesc.Trait_Resolute:
Dramatically increases the health of professional infantry units. In addition, the damage enemy offensive and heavy units deal to them is reduced.
The formation inhibits enemies’ ability to flank, letting professional infantry deal splash damage.

Every turn spent in battle makes the general and professional infantry units strike harder.
UI.MCCSlipperyIce:
Slippery Ice
Your Swift and Defense units' mobility is limited here. Their attack damage is reduced by 15%.
UI.MCCPiercingCold:
Piercing Cold
The cold is taking its toll on your troops. Your units' HP is reduced by 10%.
UI.MCCSnowStorms:
Snow Storms
It's hard to see in this storm! Your units' accuracy is reduced by 15%.
UI.MCCSpecializedWeapons:
Specialized Weapons (Outpost Armory)
Increases attack damage of your armies by 5%.
UI.MCCAdvancedStrategies:
Advanced Strategies (Outpost Headquarters)
Your units follow advanced strategies, reducing enemy bosses' HP by 5%.
UI.RitualWater:
Ritual Offering: Water
An offering for an ancient ritual. Use on the Altar of Water to invigorate your horses. 
Makes your knights and other mounted units always deal maximum damage for the duration of the adventure.

This is a venture buff that's only usable in a certain venture. It will be deleted when the venture is no longer active
UI.RitualNature:
Ritual Offering: Nature
An offering for an ancient ritual. Use on the Altar of the Nature to impede the mobility of enemy cavalry with plant growth.
Makes enemy horsemen and mounted bowmen always deal minimum damage for the duration of the adventure.

This is a venture buff that's only usable in a certain venture. It will be deleted when the venture is no longer active
UI.RitualMetal:
Ritual Offering: Metal
An offering for an ancient ritual. Use on the Altar of Metal to magically empower your metal weaponry. 
Makes your sword-wielding units and artillery always deal maximum damage for the duration of the adventure.

This is a venture buff that's only usable in a certain venture. It will be deleted when the venture is no longer active
UI.RitualStone:
Ritual Offering: Stone
An offering for an ancient ritual. Use on the Altar of Stone to make your army's skin tough as stone, easily deflecting melee strikes. 
Makes enemy swordclashers, swordwielders and swordmasters always deal minimum damage for the duration of the adventure.

This is a venture buff that's only usable in a certain venture. It will be deleted when the venture is no longer active
UI.RitualFire:
Ritual Offering: Fire
An offering for an ancient ritual. Use on the Altar of Fire to enhance the firepower of your army's arquebuses. 
Makes your arquebuse-wielding units always deal maximum damage for the duration of the adventure.

This is a venture buff that's only usable in a certain venture. It will be deleted when the venture is no longer active
UI.RitualWind:
Ritual Offering: Wind
An offering for an ancient ritual. Use on the Altar of Wind to protect your army from arrows with a barrier of wind.
Makes enemy dune marksmen, desert marksmen and mounted bowmen always deal minimum damage for the duration of the adventure.

This is a venture buff that's only usable in a certain venture. It will be deleted when the venture is no longer active
UI.AdventureWeatherConditionStormDesc:
Fighting within a hurricane means hits come harder! 
Zone Effect: The minimum and maximum damage of all units (including enemy units) is increased by 20%!
UI.AdventureWeatherConditionHeatDesc:
In such beautiful sunshine, everyone feels reinvigorated.
Zone Effect: The HP of all units (including enemy units) are increased by 20%!
UI.AdventureWeatherConditionFogDesc:
In such dense fog, sneaking up on your enemies is no challenge.
Zone Effect: All units (including enemy units) gain flanking!
UI.AdventureWeatherConditionFrostDesc:
When weighty defenders throw a punch in such frost, every surrounding unit will be swiped of their feet.
Zone Effect: All defense units (including enemy defense units) gain splash damage!
